A new condition, "spooked", gives the Orphan's negative effects when they encounter brutal Orderlies, chittering Rats, the Creepy Clown Kid or the nightmarish Gaunt & Sinister Man.

Never fear though as a new Orphan named Rollo has arrived who carries both a soothing voice and a dark secret from another world. Not to be beaten, Mrs. Prendergast has procured the services of Bill and his vicious dog Sykes in order to ensure the Orphans stay put in the Attic Bedroom.

—description from the publisher
categories: Adventure, Expansion for Base-game, Horror, Miniatures, Murder/Mystery
mechanics: Action Points, Modular Board, Push Your Luck, Tile Placement

name: Tapage Nocturne
description:
Tapage Nocturne ("Noise Complaint") is a fast playing reaction game in which your neighbours are organizing a costume party. It is 2 0’clock in the
morning, and noise is increasing due to an ongoing imitation contest...
Listen carefully sounds and indications coming from the app, and smash the right card!
The first one to smash it, wins the card but will have to do the action drawn on the back for the next turn.
When three piles are empty, party is over. Player who got the most cards wins the game.
(exemple of actions: close your eyes during the next turn, modifiy one of the app sound, and so on...)
Noise complaint game requires the use of a smartphone or tablet.

—user summary

Lorsque vos voisins organisent une soirée déguisée alcoolisée chez eux, qu’il est 2h du mat et qu’ils n’ont rien trouvé de mieux que d’organiser un concours d’imitation…
Une envie frénétique de tous les taper vous prend !
Ecoutez les sons diffusés par l’application, les indications du DJ, et soyez le plus rapide !

—description from the publisher

name: Ayodya: Tales of Archipelago
description:
Welcome to the world of fights and collaborations among heroes of Ayodya. The world where everyone strives to be the strongest, the most badass, and the most elusive hero. You can be where the powerful denawa, the swift garuda, the agile wanara, or the uncanny human are.
Clear the path to your victory individually or team up individually or team up with other future opponents. You can be a friendly foe or a deadly opponent, it's up to your strategy, bravery, and luck. So come and have a drink at Ayodya battlefield!

How to Play:
Each player's turn consists of 3 phases:

Battle phase: A player may confront other players with their Hero card and Gear card placed on the battlefield supported with Battle Phase Skill cards.
Draw phase: The player takes 2 cards from Card deck (certain Heroes have a skill that boosts the number of cards drawn.
Preparation phase: Player places, replaces, or stacks Gear cards on the battlefield. The player could also activate Preparation Phase Skill cards.

name: Vintage Racers: Speedway Promo Pack
description: The promo is a new track! - the Speedway - based off of the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. It consists of 12 double sided cards.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Racing

name: Vanguard: Seeking Sanctuary
description:
Vanguard: Seeking Sanctuary is a Solitaire Miniature Skirmish Adventure. The county of Middledale is overrun by vile monsters. You are the leader of a band of mercenaries tasked with evacuating the county and leading the trek of refugees to Sanctuary.

The rules are miniature agnostic, so you can play with any miniatures you already have.

What you need:

6 Mercenaries
10-20 Monsters, melee and ranged types
10-20 Civilians
3-6 six sided dice
Tabletop terrain

Recommended are battlemats, 3'x3'.

—description from the designer

name: ããã¼ã³! (BABOOOHN!)
description:
ããã¼ã³! (BABOOOHN!) is a Japanese card game. The players race to draw cards from the deck and get the card with the highest number of "round things" among many Disappointment cards. Beware of the "BABOOOHN!" card, because if you draw it, it will blow up and negate all the cards you have drawn so far. Who among you will collect the most round things?

ãã¬ã¤ã¤ã¼ãã¡ã¯ãããã¼ã³ã¨ãªããªãããã«ãã¾ãããã®ãéãã¾ããèª°ãä¸çªå¤ãéãããã¨ãã§ããã§ããããã
publisher's summary

name: Fist Them All
description:
Fist Them All is a game of dexterity for 3 to 8 players that will accompany your aperitif in good humor. You must drag pawns on cards representing bottoms. But beware, nothing looks more like a bottom than another bottom and some of them belong to superheroes. If they decided to use their powers, the fist party might take on a whole new look!

—description from the publisher

name: mini istanbul
description:
mini istanbul is a 2 player game inspired by Istanbul. In mini istanbul, players are merchants attempting to amass a collection of gemstones.

Inspired by Project Shrinko!, mini istanbul makes use of a limited set of custom components to recreate the experience of its big brother. Alterations to create mini istanbul include fewer resources with recalculated availability, dice for movement (no more tokens), custom spinner dials for money and items (no more stacks of tiles), an innovative pull out player board (no more cartwright tiles), and a custom set of 6 cards with 12 altered locations to suit the smaller footprint of the game.

While most Istanbul rules are applicable, several adjustments are noted in the document included in the files section.

—description from the publisher

name: The Laager
description:
This is a group of scenarios covering modern tactical conflicts in South Africa's wars using FIREPOWER. It starts with an in-depth review of the history of the conflict and related forces, including tactics, unit composition and equipment lists and then provides the following scenarios:

Operation Zulu 1975
Trouble in Ovamboland 1978
Bushman at War 1979
UNITA Resurgent 1980
Operation Super 1982
Operation Protea 1981
A Defeat for the SADF 1987

This expansion was first published as an article in The General, Vol. 25, No. 2 (1988).

—user summary
mechanics: Chit-Pull System, Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid, Simulation

name: Mr. Java
description:
Mr. Java is a resource management game for 1-4 players designed by Kevin Bouchard from Viviludi.

Have you ever wanted to run your own company? Manage people? Deliver projects?
Experience all of this with the new "Mr. Java" board game!

The game involves an IT company, but running your own company is universal: managing actions, budgets, human resources, hiring consultants, improving team productivity and of course delivering projects on time to the client while of course meeting their needs!

Your work team is made up of 3 workers (a designer, a programmer and a tester), each with their area of expertise. In addition, your work team will have special abilities throughout game play.

You also are able to have 2 new workers at your disposal (a project manager and a project controller). These workers will enable you to pay less for project and productivity cards as well as being able to manage several projects at once and increase your team’s productivity.

A game is made up of 15, 20 or 30 game turns with a range of actions to choose from.

You must complete Level 1, 2 and 3 projects in order to gain certain rewards throughout the game, including reputation points. These reputation points will enable you to obtain certain advantages in order for you to win more complex projects which will reward you in excellence stars.

Victory points will be counted in different ways. The player with the most victory points at the end of the game wins.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Variable Phase Order, Variable Player Powers, Worker Placement

name: Operation Valkyrie
description:
Operation Valkyrie is a strategic, high-stakes social deduction game themed after the historical plots to remove Adolf Hitler from power by high-ranking conspirators within the German military. Unlike some social deduction games, OV relies less on logical deduction and more by varying degrees of confidence, forcing players to lean on their intuition.

Each player will be either a Conspirator working for the Wehrmacht (German Military) or a Loyalist working for the Gestapo, the Nazi secret state police. The Conspirators know who each other are but members of the Loyalists are unaware of anyone’s identity but their own. Each round, each player will be assigned as an Operative, an Agent, or the Gestapo Chief. Operatives have been ordered to meet Hitler in a high-level meeting and contribute to a mission. Agents will investigate Operatives in an attempt to ascertain their motives by way of Suspicion cards. The Gestapo Chief’s primarily role will be to scrutinize Operatives and detain those who are particularly suspicious for additional interrogation. In their assigned roles, Conspirators will attempt to undermine Nazi operations without raising suspicions and secretly plot the Fürher’s assassination. They must leverage luck and opportunity to manage perceptions, sustain alibis, and evade suspicion long enough to successfully execute Operation Valkyrie.

—description from the designer
categories: Bluffing, Deduction, Print & Play, World War II
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hidden Roles, Traitor Game

name: Face It Challenge
description:
The Face It Challenge game is based on the "Face It Challenge" game that takes place on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon.

Each round in the game, two players each get a description of a crazy face that they must make, then show each other. The game includes a double-sided mirror so that each player can prep their face ahead of time, then at a push of the button, the mirror drops, and players start staring at one another. Freeze your face while trying to make your opponent laugh or otherwise crack their composure. Whoever holds their face longest wins the round.

name: Battlespace Next: Multi-Domain Operations
description: Battlespace Next: MDO is a card-based strategy game simulating modern peer-to-peer warfare. Engineered as a learning tool for military classrooms to engage students on the topic of Multi-Domain Operations (MDO). The game is a 2-4 player game featuring air, ground, cyber, maritime, Electronic Warfare (EW), and Information Operations (IO) capabilities. The goal if the game is to deploy and leverage forces to attack and outplay your opponent and ultimately destroy their Multi-Domain Operations Center (MDOC). For more information and purchase options visit Battlespace Next: MDO.
mechanics: Action Timer, Dice Rolling, Income, Move Through Deck, Team-Based Game

name: Meine ersten Spiele: Hallo TÃ¶pfchen!
description:
The players help Pippa or Paul get to the potty in a hurry. The dice decides, either the potty moves closer or the children have to take another drink. But if we’re not quick, there is going to be an accident. The players work together to become real potty professionals.

—description from the publisher

name: Draw a Blank
description:
In Draw a Blank, players race to form the most words from a combination of letter and blank tiles.

After rolling a die to see how many blank tiles to draw, one player will place tiles to form an active word, building onto a crossword-style board. For example, a player might play "T _ _ E." Everyone will then have 60 seconds to write down every word they can think of that fits that combination of letters and blanks. As play continues, it is possible to have more than one action word in a single round. The more words written, the more points scored. The person with the most points after all the blank tiles have been drawn or the first person to 100 points wins.

—description from the publisher

name: ãã¡ãã«ã¬ã³ãã¼ (Strawberry Calendar)
description:
ãã¡ãã«ã¬ã³ãã¼ (Strawberry Calendar) is a Japanese game using mathematics.

You are allowed to eat strawberries only on the 15th of each month. Players manipulate the calendar using maths to make today appear to be the 15th, so they can eat strawberries.

The game has a deck of red cards for the days of the month 1 to 31, and a small deck of green cards for the arithmetic functions + - × ÷ and =. Players use these cards to get to a result of 15.

The game is designed to encourage players to use mental arithmetic as they play.

user summary

publisher's summary

name: GEMINO
description:
Overview
GEMINO is a very nice puzzle game for the whole family. Simple rules (similar to "tic-tac-toe") allow for interesting, addictive gameplay. Parents, children and grandparents will gladly join the game.
To win, you need to plan your moves, block and outsmart your opponents on two boards at the same time.

Preperation
Put both two-sided boards on the table next to each other (side does not matter).
Everyone chooses 14 tiles in one pattern. The unused tiles are returned to the box.

Object
The player scores a point if he places 4 of his tiles on a line on one of the boards (horizontally, vertically or diagonally). The player removes scoring tiles from the board and turns one tile over as a point. The others tiles can be reused. If the player makes a scoring arragment on both boards in one queue - then he scores 2 points.

The end of the game
The game ends when one of the players scored 3 points (he's arranged 4 tiles in one line 3 times, or in 2-player game - 5 tiles in one line).

name: Band Is Horrible
description:
This game is made for marching band students and directors.

Deal all players seven white answer cards. The player with the biggest ego goes first. While this is almost certainly the trumpet player, they are referred to as "The Judge." The Judge draws a blue question card and reads it to the other players. Players select the card in their hand that best answers the question. Cards are played face down and shuffled. The Judge reviews all the cards and selects the winner who holds onto the blue card for the remainder of the game.

Includes: 396 high-quailty cards in a rigid two-piece box.
Each set contains 6 blank answer cards to write your own smartass responses.

—description from the publisher

NOTE: Although the publisher says 12+ for this game, there are a handful of mature innuendo cards that may be removed for younger audiences.
categories: Card Game, Humor, Music, Party Game
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: The Black Rat
description:
The plague has broken out in the city and all rats are struggling to survive.
Players play hand cards to activate new rats, to move them, to infect zones and to spread the plague. Rats which leave the city outskirts will yield immediately victory points while rats which remain in the city till the end will possibly earn more points, unless they become sick.
This easy and fast "family" game is all about risk management.

Free PnP version!

—description from the designer

name: Rolling Adventures
description:
Rolling Adventures is free Roll and Write game, which can be downloaded and played alone or with others.

It was inspired by Rolling Reams (from Jamey Stegmaier) and was combined with a flavour of Clank! (created by Paul Dennen). Creating an interesting Rol and Write with an adventurous "board".

To play the game you use two dice, which you have to add yourself. Roll them and gain two numbers you must use in one of several "mini-games" to gain resources. These resources then can be used to travel the caves to get as much gold as possible. Be aware though, if you don't get out of the caves before your last roll you have lost everything!

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Paper-and-Pencil, Point to Point Movement

name: Cube Attack
description:
Cube Attack is an abstract board game in which you have to plan the best strategy, sorting out the plenty possible combinations.

Cube Attack is a strategic board game with territorial control elements, set in a galaxy called Vanagloria, for 2-6 players.
Every player controls a space shuttle army (represented by cubes), with the aim to seize specific strategic areas (called Planets) to arm, strengthen, increase the number and above all obtain points to acquire the galactic supremacy.

—description from the publisher

name: Super Dungeon: Masterclass â Chuy and Apprentice
description:
Blasting their way south from Arcadia alongside Steelhorse Candy, Chuy and his misfit sidekick, known only as The Apprentice, have an uncommon knack for stirring up trouble. The minions of the Dark Consul have become obsessed with The Apprentice's capture. No doubt they are drawn to the young Apprentice Mage's unique connection to the magics of Crystalia.

Chuy and Apprentice are Limited Edition miniatures that can be used in your games of Super Dungeon and Rail Raiders Infinite!

CONTENTS:
1x Chuy Masterclass Miniature
1x Apprentice Mage Masterclass Miniature
1x Chuy Hero Card
1x Chuy Rail Raiders Infinite Card
1x Apprentice Mage Hero Card
1x The Apprentice Rail Raiders Infinite Card.
2x 25mm Black Bases

Take your Super Dungeon hobby to the next level with Super Dungeon: Masterclass! This premium line of resin models is specifically designed for hobby enthusiasts and gamers alike! Featuring Heroes and monsters from throughout the realms of Crystalia, these finely detailed miniatures bring the world of Super Dungeon to life as never before. Each Masterclass miniature includes cards that allow it to be used in your games of Super Dungeon!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: Super Dungeon: Masterclass â Shinigami
description:
Few types of death spectre inspire such dread as Kagejima's shinigami. These deadly spirits lure victims into cursed pacts, offering up knowledge or power that inevitably leads to an unfortunate death. Indeed, so insidious and cruel are these pacts that many seek death in order to end the suffering their bargain causes.

Shinigami is an all-new Mini-Boss from the realm of Kagejima!

CONTENTS:
1x Shinigami Masterclass Miniature
1x Shinigami Mini-Boss Explore Card
1x Shinigami MIni-Boss Arcade Card
1x Unique Treasure Card
1x 50mm Black Base

Take your Super Dungeon hobby to the next level with Super Dungeon: Masterclass! This premium line of resin models is specifically designed for hobby enthusiasts and gamers alike! Featuring Heroes and monsters from throughout the realms of Crystalia, these finely detailed miniatures bring the world of Super Dungeon to life as never before. Each Masterclass miniature includes cards that allow it to be used in your games of Super Dungeon!

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: BurtoÅ¡anas ÄempionÄts
description:
Burtošanas ÄempionÄts is a creative and educational board game for the family. A game that will expand your vocabulary and bring out even forgotten words from the depths of your mind. The aim is to create Latvian words from the most valuable syllables, thus accumulating as many points as possible.
On each card, there is one syllable that, when put together during the game, forms words. The rarer the syllable used, the more valuable the word is created. Each syllable has been assigned points depending on the frequency of use of syllables in Latvian. With this game you can make more than 2000 words. These include nouns, verbs, adjectives and adverbs. Words can be formed in basic forms and inflections - either. They can be both serious and a little unserious.

name: Puerto Miau: Roll and Steal
description:
Puerto Miau: Roll and Steal is a roll and write game where you will have to compete to be the cat that manages to steal as many fish from the fishmonger, become the cat that manages to steal more fish.

Roll the dice and start moving your tile around the board, you will have to choose carefully where you fall to achieve a good score since you will not be able to return to that place since you will not be the only cat moving around the board if you play accompanied, to steal. You will have to resort to your luck only then you can successfully steal each fish.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Map Reduction, Paper-and-Pencil, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Frozen II: Helft Olaf!
description:
Poor Olaf! He has been blown apart by the wind and his whole body is now scattered around the forest. His friends Elsa, Anna, Kristoff and Sven get into the forest to search all his parts and re-assemble Olaf. With a bit of luck and a good memory, the players can support the friends in this task.

In this cooperative game the players move one of the friends, based on the result of the spinner, around the forest tracks. If the turn ends on one of Olaf‘s body parts, the players pick it up, show it to everyone and then place it backside up on the collection board. Once a player reaches a field depicting Olaf, the players can now try to assemble Olaf. But they need to remember well as he must be built in correct order, starting with the feet and if an incorrect part is turned over, this assembly round is over.

The friends win if they manage to collect all of Olaf‘s parts and assemble them before the wind reaches the end of its track and blows Olaf‘s parts away.
mechanics: Cooperative Game, Memory, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Le Mother Phoquer
description:
PARTY GAME: + Trash + Dirty + Better. Make funny and unusual card combinations to make a lot of players laugh. Discomfort and laughter guaranteed!
GAMEPLAY: The "Seal", designated at the start of the game, distributes 6 Response cards to the players. He then reads 1 Hole-Pitch phrase aloud. Each person completes the blank sentence with one of their Answer cards. Whoever has the funniest phrase wins and becomes the new "Seal".
400 TRASH HUMOR CARDS: All the most trashy and annoying cards in one game. Judge the humor of your friends with thousands of possible combinations.

—description from the publisher (translated)

JEU DE SOIRÉE : + Trash + Sale + Mieux. Fais des combinaisons de cartes drôles et insolites pour faire rire un max de joueurs. Malaises et fous rires garantis !
GAMEPLAY : Le Phoquer, désigné en début de partie, distribue 6 cartes Réponses aux joueurs. Il lit ensuite 1 carte Phrase à trou à voix haute. Chacun complète la phrase à trou avec une de ses cartes Réponses. Celui qui a la phrase la plus drôle gagne et devient le nouveau Phoquer.
400 CARTES D'HUMOUR TRASH : Toutes les cartes les plus trash et génantes réunies dans un jeu. Juge l'humour de tes potes avec des milliers de combinaisons possibles.

—description from the publisher
categories: Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: Monopoly: My Hero Academia
description:
Build your hero team in MONOPOLY: My Hero Academia! Make your way across the board choosing between Class 1-A’s best and brightest, including fan favorite students and teachers. Draw from Go Beyond! and Plus Ultra! decks to advance your team, but make sure to avoid Detention!

Includes:
6 Custom Tokens featuring Eraserhead’s Visor, Grenade Glove, Deku’s Mask, Dummy Bomb, Shigaraki’s Hand, UA Sigil
Custom Designed Game Board
Houses & Hotels renamed Rewards & Trophies
Custom Chance & Community Chest Cards renamed Go Beyond! & Plus Ultra!
Custom themed MONOPOLY money
Rules

—description from the publisher's website
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection

name: Monopoly: SSC Napoli
description:
With the Monopoly SSC Napoli, fans and supporters will be able to challenge each other, between probabilities and unexpected events, retracing the most exciting moments in the recent history of SSC Napoli.


Monopoly SSC Napoli Calcio, appassionati e tifosi potranno sfidarsi, tra probabilità ed imprevisti, ripercorrendo i momenti più emozionanti della recente storia del SSC Napoli.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Monopoly: Edizione Napoli
description:
Monopoly: Edizione Napoli this edition takes in the Italian city of Naples.

The board shows the Neapolitan toponymy: places such as la pizzeria di quartiere, la gelateria del cuore, il parco giochi.
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Lose a Turn, Player Elimination, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Trading

name: Seal Squad
description:
Seal Squad. The fishy game of cooperation!

Play is important. Play is for FUN. Play is for CONNECTING. Play is a great way for kids to LEARN. Given how rushed life is, it can be hard to set aside time to just PLAY!

It's East to Play!

Roll both dice
As a team choose the best Seal to move
Collect fish and beat the Walrus


—description from the publisher

name: SET: Print & Play Demo
description:
In the game, certain combinations of three cards are said to make up a set. For each one of the four categories of features — color, number, shape, and shading pattern — the three cards must display that feature as either a) all the same, or b) all different. Put another way: For each feature the three cards must avoid having two cards showing one version of the feature and the remaining card showing a different version.

Winner is who in the end has the most SETs.

In this demo version, only one deck is available.

Published during the COVID-19 Pandemic.
The publisher posted: "Em solidariedade ao movimento #FIQUEEMCASA e buscando levar mais diversão às famílias brasileiras neste momento de isolamento, disponibilizamos algumas degustações de produtos e jogos no formato Print & Play para serem baixados."

name: ãã¯ããª (Nawabari)
description:
In ãã¯ããª (Nawabari), the players compete over a series of rounds to score the most points.

Each round is composed of 3 or 4 turns, in which players will draft a card from a row. At the start of each turn, some cards are turned face up and ordered by number. The players each draft a card in the order of their tokens, from left to right, and the placement of these tokens on the cards from this turn will determine the turn order for the next round.

Once selected, a player takes the chosen card and places it in front of themselves. The cards have a number of attributes, such as odd/even number; terrain type; and card effect. Some cards provide an immediate benefit; others allow conversions; and some are conditional effects.

At the end of each round, players will score for the current round's scoring card, and other scoring types. Afterwards, the players simultaneously choose one card from their tableau to keep, which also determines turn order for the next round.

name: Activity Knock Out
description:
Who is never at a loss of words?
The players role the die to determine the letters which can be used to create words to be found. The challenge lies in the fact that the time one team needs to write down the words can be used by the other team to find the words.

name: Escape Game: Disney Villains
description:
The villains of the Disney universe are unleashed! Jafar, Maleficent, Ursula, Hades and the Queen of Hearts are ready to do anything to carry out their Machiavellian plans. Play as Disney's bravest heroes and heroines and travel from Wonderland to Agrabah to complete your quest.

The Escape Room range is inspired by the Escape Room rooms. Find their incredible atmosphere at home! Go on an adventure, observe, manipulate and solve various puzzles that will put your logical mind to the test. Uncover fantastic puzzles, travel through legendary landscapes from Disney films and overcome the five big villains!

This Escape Game contains 5 scenarios of 60 minutes each.

name: Vive la France !
description:
In Vive la France ! each player gets to play a faction and to sets up plots, each more improbable than the next, defend them and then try to impose them.
Fast, simple and fun .

Once the Factions are assigned, the game can begin!
It is broken down into several game turns and phases.
Firstly - players have 4 turns to create conspiracy theories (using memes on the cards).
Then they have to present their conspiracy, remembering as many memes as possible from the previous phase. They score a point for each one.
The players will then use their faction cards to hire some personalities to get special advantages for the next phases.

And so on until one player gets enough points to win.

name: Paranormal Detectives: Man vs Meeple Promo Card
description:
A new story card for the game.

Originally available as part of the 2020 Man vs Meeple Kickstarter campaign.

name: Critical Fail
description:
Critical Fail is a Fill-In-The-Blank Party Game for RPG Lovers.

Imagine Cards Against Humanity had a Safe-for-Work dragon-baby with D&D. That is how you get Critical Fail. Players take turns reading prompt cards and playing response cards.

The Ranger caught dinner. Hope you like __________.

The Paladins mount
A level 16 Goblin
Orphans... Lots of orphans


It's normal to panic when the GM mentions __________.

Fall Damage
Blank Character Sheets
Fireball and more Fireball


—description from the designer
categories: Card Game, Fantasy, Party Game, Print & Play
mechanics: Hand Management, Player Judge, Simultaneous Action Selection

name: FRITZO Cube
description:
The FRITZO Cube is an innovative and sophisticated game for almost all age groups. Each cube consists of 27 cubes. Each individual cube is unique in its color arrangement. The ingenious thing about it: Depending on the game variant, the dice have to be placed next to each other so that they have to meet different or matching colors in all directions.

Players earn points based on rows and "staircases" and player with the highest score wins.

—description from publisher
categories: Abstract Strategy, Action / Dexterity, Party Game, Puzzle
mechanics: Matching, Pattern Recognition, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Stadt Land WÃ¼rfelspaÃ
description:
In this creative word and dice game, players try to find terms with the same initial letters as quickly as possible.

Everyone plays at the same time. Like in the well-known word game Scategories, the goal is to fill in all the squares and thus collect the most points at the end of the round. In Stadt Land Würfelspaß, however, new themes are rolled before the game, making the game varied and exciting!

name: Rainbow Airlines
description:
You and your fellow travelers have hit a snag. The airport has straight up canceled all of the flights, all of them! Here you are stuck on beautiful Hawaii with no way to get back to that boring job.

But wait, there’s hope! An airline has just opened its doors and if you and your fellow travelers can prove your mettle at building planes and getting travelers on board, you may just get back home!

Each turn you’ll be pulling and rolling dice to try to fix 3 planes. Since you’ve been hired by Rainbow Airlines to make this happen, they want their planes to be extra colorful! Make each plane piece a different color for bonus points! Then try to secure passengers who will get on board your carefully* constructed planes! Each plane has a preferred destination, which is up to you if that’s where you manage to send it to!

Out do your opponents and win big in this puzzly roll and write that brings color and fun to your table! Players draft dice using color and number of the dice drafted to assign to the plane, destination or passengers. Each game brings challenges to the players for them to consider!

-description from designer
publishers: Lagniappe Games, Roll and Write Revolution

name: BoxOff
description:
BoxOff is a solo abstract strategy game. It rises above the level of a mere puzzle because of its random set-up and user-defined board size. The random set-up makes it like a playing-card solitaire game.

The game is played on a rectangular board of any size, as long as it has an even number of squares. 7x8, 8x12, and 12x15 are common sizes. The board is filled with stones or marbles in various colors. For an easy game, use 3 colors. For a game of medium difficulty, use 4 colors. For a difficult game use 5 colors. There must be an even number of each color, because they're going to be removed in pairs. Typically you would use an equal number of each color.

A pair of stones of the same color may be removed from the board if the pair define opposite corners of a rectangle that contains no other stones. They could be in a line (a 1xn rectangle) or diagonal corners of a non-linear rectangle. The goal is to remove all the stones.

This game was first described in Games Magazine in 2013, and later in the Abstract Games magazine in 2020. There have been electronic versions for iOS and Android. BoxOff is now being published by NewVenture Games in three versions: a board game, peg game, and travel-size.

name: Spukstaben Promo: Trainingsaufgaben
description:
It's midnight at the old print shop and the little ghosts are back to steal your block letters - such SPUKSTABEN!

Can you manage together to stop the SPUKSTABEN until dawn?

name: Historia Bez Cenzury. Misja: ZwyciÄstwo
description:
Misja: ZwyciÄstwo is a strategic board game that will take you to the fronts of World War II. You will take on the role of war heroes and your task will be to carry out secret missions, the success of which will contribute to defeating the Third Reich. Your tasks will include transporting weapons, smuggling radio stations and delivering orders. This will be prevented by spies from foreign intelligence services and various adversities, which you will face as you drive such legends as the Elk or the PzKpfw VI Tiger! Earned medals will testify to your victories.

Victory Points are earned by defeating enemies or completing missions. The game ends when one of the players scores a certain number of victory points.
mechanics: Pick-up and Deliver, Point to Point Movement

name: Battle for the Carolinas Dice
description:
The war for independence has moved south towards the Carolinas. Patriots are eager to break from the mother country. England is threatening to extinguish any rebellion that dares to foment disobedience to the crown. Battles and skirmishes dot the countryside of the Carolinas. Choose your side and defend your cause!

Battle for the Carolinas Dice is a dice game where the roll of the dice determines your position on the battlefield. Move your soldiers, bring in more reinforcements and treat the wounded to get them back on the battlefield. When in range, fire at your opponent to inflict damage or casualties.

If your opponent's dice count dwindles down to three active before you do, you win!

The fate of the Carolinas begins with the roll of the dice...

—description from publisher
categories: American Revolutionary War, Dice, Print & Play, Wargame

name: First Victories: Wellington versus Napoleon
description:
First game in the The Glory and Empire series.

Glory and Empire is a fresh look at grand tactical command, maneuver and combat during the French Revolutionary and Napoleonic Period. The system is focused on command, maneuver and combat that is fast playing, yet accurate and rich with detail.

The game is 125m per hex. Units are battalions and companies for infantry, regiments and squadrons for cavalry and companies for artillery. Each strength point is 100 men for infantry, 50 men and horses for cavalry or one section, or 2 guns, for artillery. Counters are 5/8".

The rules consist of a Soldier's, Battalion and Brigade rules set. Players can learn the basics with the Soldier's rules, move to a full fledged simulation with the Battalion Game and pick and choose rules from the Brigade Game to suit their tastes. Or players can jump right into the Brigade Game and understand how grand tactical maneuvering was practiced on the battlefield during the 18th and 19th centuries.

The Soldier's Game gives players new to the era an introduction to foundational concepts of tactics in the horse and musket era. In the Soldier's and Battalion Games there are the usual Line, Column, Square and skirmishers. The Battalion game has two types of Skirmishers, introduces important concepts for maneuvering forces on the battlefield and has more detailed close combat procedures. The Brigade Game adds close columns, attack columns, closed square, Austrian division masses. Artillery is simplified for the Soldier's and Battalion Games, but the Battalion Game adds artillery ammunition. The Brigade Game adds bombardment zones, bounce through, howitzer fire and separate ammunition tracking for round shot, shell, canister and shrapnel. The Brigade Game also gives players more tools to react to enemy moves.

The piece de resistance of the Brigade Game are the command rules. Players choose to form their brigades into Grand Columns or Lines of Battle. To deploy for battle the player must decide which evolution to use to form Line of Battle and shake his men into fighting order. To cross a bridge or move through a defile in the face of the enemy will take careful planning to avoid being embarrassed by the enemy when the columns emerge on the other side. Keeping the troops in good order is all important if the day is to be won.

The system will make its debut with Lock 'n Load publishing, featuring Wellington's first victories against Napoleon's forces in the Peninsula, with the battles of Roliça and Vimeiro. If all goes well we'll follow it up with Fuentes de Oñoro and Salamanca.

Play Glory and Empire and learn the trade of fighting a Napoleonic period battle and earn your marshal's baton.

Facebook Page

name: 80-luku: Vuosikymmenen peli
description:
How much do you know about the 80s, that decade of the fall of the Berlin Wall, the Decade of Dynasty and Dingo?

200 cards with one question per card and the answer on other side. There is either multiple choice question from one of the five categories or kind of text recognition task.

Players take turns asking questions. The first player to get five correct answers wins the game. Multiple players can get points on a round.

—user summary

name: Flower Garden
description:
Build your garden and collect your favorite flower Set to win the game. Gain resources and income to bloom and do evil scheme to sabotage your neighbors.

Flower Garden is a gardening game for 2-4 players ages 12+. It is a light-mid weight game and can last for 30 -60 min.

In order to win the game you need to collect 4 of the same color of flowers in your own garden. However there are exactly 4 cards of the same color in the flower deck (Total of 20 flower cards with 5 different color set). In order to collect the flower you need, you would have to sabotage, steal, or change color of your flower.

Before owning flowers, you have to go through the process of gaining seeds and blooming them with resources.
You may sell the flowers to gain income for plan cards. Plan cards will help your garden and/or destroy your neighbors.

To add a twist in the game, there is a Queen card that has 2 different personalities: Flower Queen and Weed Queen. One card with 2 sides. Flower Queen is definitely the queen you need in your garden, you would not want to have Weed Queen destroying your garden. To summon the queen in a garden, a player prays for the queen by scarifying a flower or pay the coins. If another player prays for the queen, she will be moving around different garden depending on the prayer choice.

The game ends as soon as the first player successfully collected 4 colors of the same flower.

—description from designer
mechanics: Market, Race, Set Collection, Take That

name: Exo Worlds
description:
Exo Worlds is a space-themed game for 2-4 players, easy to learn and fun for all the family.
On your turn you will swap a card in your hand with a card in the "visible zone", then you can play cards - building your solar system with the aim of fulfilling your secret mission.
But beware! Opponents will play destructive asteroids and comets to sabotage you on your way!

—description from the designer

name: Romp Thru The Swamp
description:
[From the rules] Be the first to navigate your way out of the swamp to safety and victory! But be quick or Swampy the monster will drag you back in! Can you escape Swampy's clutches?
[From the box] Danger! Swampy doesn't like children in his swamp! Don't disturb his sleep or he might come to get you! Try getting out of his swamp and onto the jetty... but you're not safe yet! Can you escape... Swampy's last grasp?

A battery powered motorized monster moves up and down a track in the middle of the board potentially dragging player pawns back after the end of each round of turn. Players roll and move a standard D6 die to progress through the board, with the goal of getting to the jetty by exact count to be safe from the monsters claws.
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Track Movement

name: Yunomi
description:
A trivia game where the questions are about the other players! Every time you play the game the answers change and you learn something you didn’t know about your friends!

In each round, one player is in the ‘spotlight’ (SP) and the others have to answer questions about them. Questions range from easy (what is the SP’s dog’s name?) to esoteric (does the SP believe in life on other planets?).

If you get it right, you move on the board the number of spaces specified on the question card, get it wrong, you don't move. The next round the question will be about the next person in the circle and on and on it goes until somebody reaches the finish line.

name: The Shadow World: A Sci-Fi Storytelling Game
description:
London in 1900. A brilliant scientist leaves the world to create his own empire underground. He is determined to prove his radical theory - that gravity is a geometric property of space-time. What happens when time and space collapse and dimensions intersect? Descend into the shadow world to find out.
These 20 picture cards can be combined almost infinitely. No matter how you place them, they magically fit together to form coherent scenes and offer you countless possibilities to create stories.

—description from the publisher

name: Cursed Castle
description:
Take charge of three hunters walking the forgotten hallways of the Cursed Castle in an attempt to purge the ancient evil that dwells there.

Allocate dice to your heroes' columns to solve each battle in this horror puzzle. As your party progresses you will uncover powerful artifacts, learn new skills, and make combinations to cleanse the living dead. Building up your heroes is easier than preserving them in this tiny brutal adventure!

The Cursed Castle is a solo game specially developed for Pencil First Games' "Stuck at Home Design Contest" and heavily inspired by Darkest Dungeon and other dark fantasy titles.

—description from the designer
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Solo / Solitaire Game, Worker Placement with Dice Workers

name: El Mundo Oscuro: ExpansiÃ³n Oscura
description:
10 cards with which players will create deadly combinations with unexpected results. It is used to have more cards and to be able to play modalities such as EXPERT, VERSUS and RANDOM.

With this expansion you will experience masterful plays, experience how the game grows and mutates ... change a card in the deck, change the game ... Swap cards, customize your deck and you will experience a fantastic and fun competition.

Nuevos Bufones (Descarta 4 / Revela y Pierde)
Dark Gangster
Sibila Oscura
Bruja Oscura
Nuevos Popes (Utiliza / Cancela)
Senadores (Toma 1)
Emperador Oscuro
Emperatriz Oscura
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy
mechanics: Hand Management, Memory, Open Drafting, Player Elimination

name: ããã­ã£ã³â³ãã©ãã§ããã³ãå¼µãï¼(Yurucamp Tents Everywhere!)
description:
In this 1-4 player game based on the hit manga "laid-back camp", you want to get your tents all set up and ready for camping!

In gameplay terms, this means players lay out a pyramid of 28 cards (one card at a time) from a deck of 36 cards (4x each of 0-8) by using math to make sure that every card can be played correctly. that is, each card played in the pyramid must either be the sum or the difference between the two cards below it (playing a 8 or 2 if they respectively are more than 8 or less than 0).

Players win the game when one one player can a play card or the team cooperatively creates a 7 layer pyramid.
mechanics: Communication Limits, Cooperative Game, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Imperio
description:
Dreams, strategy and action ... this is how an Empire is created. Invest in properties and companies, accumulating wealth and doing business around the world, with this strategy game that will make you a millionaire.

Imperio ("Empire") is a board game, in which each player will try to build their own business empire. Inspired by the market economy, Imperio proposes to simulate the economic growth of people in the real world, through the purchase of goods in any of the 34 cities of the planisphere.

You will be able to acquire houses, buildings, restaurants and hotels or set up your own factory to sell products all over the planet and manage them by moving with your own plane. You can even have your own casino, while increasing your economic power. These goods can be purchased in any of the 34 cities in which the planisphere is divided, while you move along the path of the board with your avatar. Your profession can also help in this exciting enrichment career. The acquisition of new cities will allow you to increase the number of goods at your disposal, giving you greater chances of winning the game.

Although the objective is common to all players, the strategy is their own, so taking into account market conditions, at any time during the game, you can change your strategy to win the game. The first player to meet the goal of $ 1,000,000 wins the game.

The players move along the track and advance to the position indicated by the dice. Once the city is acquired, the player has the right to collect a rent for it and can additionally invest in different goods to increase the rent. Investments can be real estate such as houses, buildings and towers with a different value for each one, both for the purchase and the income obtained. Another type of investment can be in businesses such as hotels and restaurants, which have a variable income or a casino that, being the most expensive, can be acquired when there is already capital, but the profit obtained is quite high when the players fall into that town. And finally another type of investment is the acquisition of factories that allows players to buy inputs and sell products to the rest of the players.

Market conditions may vary throughout the game and may make it necessary to modify the strategy. Likewise, these changes also allow obtaining high dividends for those who can take advantage of them.

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Dice Rolling, Income, Ownership, Roll / Spin and Move, Set Collection, Stock Holding, Track Movement, Trading

name: Legacy of Old Rus
description:
“Legacy of Old Rus” is a roll and write game that seeks to reproduce the feel of a full-fledged RPG.
There's a long legacy campaign consisting of multiple plot missions.

You can also play the game in the casual, "one-shot" mode.

Prepare your heroes for a challenging journey to Far Away Kingdoms.
Each player takes control of a unique hero. The game takes eight rounds. During each of these rounds, you roll four dice and use their results to receive magic items and explore the world of Far Away Kingdoms. You will also develop your hero's skills, use various items of equipment and unique abilities to your advantage. When exploring the world, you will visit many interesting places and meet different characters — friendly and hostile.
At the end of the game, the player who gained the most glory points wins.

-The demo play will be available on Essen 2021-
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Legacy Game, Paper-and-Pencil, Scenario / Mission / Campaign Game, Solo / Solitaire Game
publishers: Jet Games Studio, Lavka Games, Open Borders Studio

name: Ð£ÑÐ°, ÑÑÐ¾ Ð³ÑÐ¸Ð±! (Hooray! It's a mushroom!)
description:
In Ð£ÑÐ°, ÑÑÐ¾ Ð³ÑÐ¸Ð±! ("Hooray! It's a mushroom!") players find themselves in a magical forest and, like real mushroom pickers, try to find as good mushrooms as possible.

On your turn, you may take any visible card. It is at this moment that you need to be as careful as possible, because you can often understand from the card back which mushroom or plant is hiding on the back. It can be a valuable mushroom or berry or a poisonous mushroom can be caught, which will take away victory points from you at the end of the game, or it can be nothing at all.

Once all the cards have been picked up, points are totalled and the player with the most points wins.

name: ãããã«ãããã« (Doppeldoppel)
description:
Doppeldoppel is a trick-taking game for 3 to 4 players about carrying souls down to a lower world. However, if two souls descend at the same time, they will disappear!

The game uses an irregular deck of cards, with 1-3 cards in each of ranks 1-6 in each of 3 suits. Depending upon the player count, some cards are played face down, and others face up, but it is a "must-follow" game, and the highest ranked card of the lead suit will win. However, in keeping with the theme, if two or more cards of the same rank are played, they are removed from consideration.

The winner of the trick collects any remaining cards into a score pile. All cards start at -1 points, but each rank has a unique scoring or play affect. For instance, if you have at least three cards of rank 1, each of your rank 1 cards is worth +2 points instead of -1; each rank 5 card is worth +7 points if you have no rank 6 cards.

The game lasts a number of rounds equal to the number of players; at the end, the person with the most points wins.

name: Nervos
description:
Nervos is a real-time puzzle game that combines elements of Ubongo with Ghost Blitz.

The game includes a stack of puzzle cards and 4 polyomino pieces. Each puzzle card shows a shape that can be made using exactly 3 of the pieces. A puzzle card is revealed and the players race, mentally, to determine which piece is not used. Once they feel confident, they grab the piece, and then have a few seconds to "show their work" by completing the shape with the other pieces.

The games ends when a player successfully completes 4 cards; alternatively, players are eliminated if they incorrectly answer 3 cards.

name: 5 Sekund: Dzieci kontra DoroÅli
description: A totally new game from the famous “5 second rule” series. This time there are questions from children and adults worlds. Parents can play against their kids and check how much they know about their world. Play in teams in order to earn points faster and more effectively.

name: Goblin Firework Fight
description:
Goblins have come to the town of Sandpoint, intent upon stealing their fireworks for an upcoming festival. Do you have the goblin grit to pillage your way to victory and emerge from the town with the most fireworks?

The game is played over a number of rounds. Each round, every goblin takes a turn pulling a loot token from the town's treasure pile. These tokens might represent useful tools or valuable treasure like fireworks, dogslicers (goblin knives), or shields. Unfortunately, the tribe's most fearsome beast, a pig called Squealy Nord, is also hiding in the treasure, bringing mayhem and chaos to any who draw his token from the pile. You never know what you might get.

Fighty goblins can choose dogslicers and just steal from their neighbors instead of raiding the village. Smart goblins will take some shields to defend themselves from their peers. Crafty goblins with leadership qualities may choose instead to take the badge of leadership, the Pickle Token, signifying for all their prominence and importance as well as the right to pick first next time.

After 10 rounds and one last free for all opportunity to steal from each other on the way back home, one goblin is declared the "bestest goblin of the raid" and basks in glory and the admiration of their peers. Until the next raid...

—description from the publisher
mechanics: Action Retrieval, Advantage Token, Open Drafting, Take That, Turn Order: Claim Action

name: Family Meme Night
description:
From the creators of What Do You Meme?

Match the funniest caption to the photo to make your own Meme!

The goal of Family Meme Night is to win the most Photo Cards by coming up with the funniest Caption Card/Photo Card combos. The target number of Photo Cards needed to win varies by the number of players.

name: Co na to ÄeÅ¡i?
description: Board game for two teams of players, where they compete and try to guess and answer to question. Answers were submitted by Czech people and players try to guess, what the people answered the most.

name: Ãtat d'urgence
description:
Un homme tousse à Wuhan, une femme a de la fièvre à Londres, un voyageur arrive à Paris : c’est parti pour une épidémie mondiale ! Seul problème : vous n’avez aucune compétence et votre système de santé est digne du Moyen Âge… Incarnez le gouvernement, le conseil scientifique, les laboratoires, les complotistes ou les médias et faites les bons choix pour conserver la confiance du peuple et faire fondre celle de vos adversaires.
Tri des patients à l’hôpital ou applaudissements aux fenêtres ? Un documentaire complotiste ou l’avis d’Éric Zemmour ? Quelle carte jouer pour vous aider ? Dans ce deckbuilding d’affrontement aux règles simples et efficaces, vous tenterez de dénouer les fils compliqués d’un virus planétaire. Essayez d’être le dernier à qui les Français accordent encore un peu de confiance !
Un jeu de cartes stratégique qui retrace un an et demi d’épidémie sous la plume de Jérémy Ferrari.
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Player Elimination, Solo / Solitaire Game, Take That

name: Starlots
description:
Starlots is four games in one played on a two-sided cloth board. The various games encourage both competition and teamwork. The big adventure game on the map side of the board works like a miniature Lightraider mission with snippets of adventure on every card. You’ll face trolls, goblins, flowing lava, portals, and much more. The movement racing games on the flip side develop strategy and focus. The fast-moving letter game builds a quick mind.

Box includes flippable playing board that supports two games on each side. All games are played in turns, round-robin style.
ZORPTFILTHUMPER is a letter jumble game with point values derived from which letters are used to make words.
ZigZag Dragon and Goblins at the Gate is a roll-and-move game where the board presents various obstacles.
Lightraider Adventure (standard mode) is a collaborative game using card drafting and dice to complete movement-based, team objectives.
Lightraider Adventure (enhanced mode) using an expansion First Watch card deck.
mechanics: Card Play Conflict Resolution, Dice Rolling, Race, Roll / Spin and Move, Spelling, Team-Based Game

name: Vandrouki: ÐÐ¼ÐµÑÐ¸ÐºÐ°
description:
A board is a map of America (North America and South America). The goal of the travellers is to collect as many points as they can for visited countries. And this is not always about countries' quantity.

Each player is a traveller with the unique citizenship. In the beginning of a game a player gets citizenship (Russia, Belarus, Ukraine or Kazakhstan), 100 dollars and three bonus cards.

In a player's turn he can do one of the following actions:

to visit a new country by bus, by plane, by ship or


by hitchhiking. A player moves his meeple to new country on the board. In order to do it he needs to pay corresponding money (price for bus travel or plane travel) or roll a dice (using luck in hitchhiking).

to earn money by working in a player's current country.
to make Visa (USA Visa or Canada Visa). Without Visa it is impossible to visit some countries in the game.
to make international passport.


Also a player in his turn can play bonus cards.

For visiting new country a player gets a flag of the country and gets corresponding points; then he gets a bonus card.

A game ends when all countries are visited. A player with the most points wins.
mechanics: Income, Point to Point Movement, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Pipo
description: Pipo is an Alien party game for all Occasions! Simply play your Alien card and set and instruction based on the aliens features for the next player to match and then set their own. Quick, easy and for all ages, that's why its great for parties.
categories: Bluffing, Card Game, Fantasy, Humor, Negotiation, Party Game, Science Fiction

name: Oltakozz okosan!
description:
Oltakozz okosan! is a hungarian Roll and Move game about the Covid-19, where players fight the virus by trying to vaccinate themselves and earn the Covid Certification. In addition players can get the infection if they are not careful enough or if someone else infects them.

Players has to get two of the same vaccines from the Hospital and a Covid Certificate from the Government Office. They can only get vaccinated if they are not infected, this applies to the Covid Certificate as well. When somebody has all of above and not infected at the moment, wins the game. If the game applies to be too short this way, they can play until getting the third vaccine.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Roll / Spin and Move

name: The Garden of the Moon: The Onward Path
description:
"As the sun sinks, the birds of the sky turn into shadows.
You can’t sleep. You put on your coat and take a stroll through the streets drowned in the red tide of dusk.
Soon, you reach the outskirts of the city. You walk out through the Gate of Dreams."
Submitted for the Zine Quest challenge on Kickstarter.
An experimental RPG zine, with an eclectic combination of zen and baroque elements. It narrates the fantastical journey to "that secret crossroad of the worlds, the Garden of the Moon", the story being "sprinkled" with five challenges, in the form of five mini games.
The mini games are simple and accessible, their aim being to strike that thin balance between breeziness and enough challenge to make them interesting. The idea is to play the entire booklet at once, which will provide for unexpected intrigue and variety in this serene setting.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Movement Points, Role Playing, Solo / Solitaire Game

name: Portal Potties
description:
Our Wizards have lost their jobs. So they decided to get into the human waste removal business. Teleport poop into your competitors portal potties to put them out of business.

Players draw cards and follow the instructions on them to try to eliminate the other players by filling up their games boards with poop tokens.

The last player with an open game board wins.
mechanics: Player Elimination, Point to Point Movement, Take That

name: Undermine
description:
Garden gnomes have a secret life. Unbeknownst to you, the gnomes are mining your yard for gems! And, all this time you thought you had a gopher problem!

Your goal in the game is to collect as many sets of gems as you can in this cute and fanciful mining game.

You'll start out by setting up a mess of cards in the center of the table, that will be made up of gems and mushrooms. These cards will act as the "mine".

Each player will then take turns building tunnels through the mine collecting gems and mushrooms. Gems can be sold through-out the game to get more tunnels and other tools. Mushrooms can only be used at the end of the game as to expand the size of gem sets that you can score.

Sets must be made of all the same type of gem/mushroom, or all different ones. The bigger the set you collect, the more the set is worth.

The game ends once any Gnome has 50 money, or any Gnome is out of tunnel segments they can build. The Gnome that has the most money at the end of the game is the winner!

—description from the designer

name: Superclub: Chelsea Player Cards 2022/23
description: Player cards pack containing the entire up-to-date Chelsea first team squad – hot off the press. Perfect for passionate Chelsea fans, as well as Superclub fans who just want more player cards but not necessarily all club manager folders. This is a real bargain on the transfer market!
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Sports
mechanics: Action Drafting, Auction/Bidding, Command Cards, Income, Investment, Open Drafting, Ownership, Turn Order: Stat-Based

name: Mystery Grams
description:
A collection of self-contained small card mysteries, brain teasers, and mystery grams. The canister is filled with cards small enough fit in your pocket and ready to take anywhere anytime.

Players can tackle the visual puzzles solo or as teams. Each card is a self-contained mystery providing isual and wordplay clues to solve individually.

Competitive players or teams can set a target number of cards to solve within a certain amount of time.

name: Bear Jelly Poker
description:
Bear Jelly Poker is a set collector with the goal of making the strongest 6-card Poker Hands from exchanging and acquiring cards from a tableau.

This is a TGM 2022 Fall Entry and so only contains 32 cards, 1-9 in 4 colors (4-6 have reduced copies and include bicolored cards). Starting with a 3-5 card hand, exchange any cards with a row/diagonal/column in the tableau. Then acquire a row/diagonal/column in the tableau to get to an 8 card hand (rules are slightly different for a 4-player game). Players are rewarded based on how many melds are weaker than theirs. After a certain number of rounds, the winner is the player with the most points.

name: Witch & Bitch: Il Tempo del Chaos
description: This expansion includes new scenarios, cards, and supports one more player, bringing the max player count to 6.

name: Kattelurerna o Skatten
description: A fast paced adventure for the whole family. Somewhere on the island is a treasure. Find it and hurry back to the ship. Look out for sculls, sea creatures, cannons and the other cattrickies! Roll the dice, decide your next step, move your cattricky and look out for threats.

name: Spoof
description:
Family Board Games for Kids and Adults: Spoof is the hilarious bluffing board game that will have you talking and laughing all night. Provides the best party games for adults and family.

Be Creative & Fool Your Friends: "Spoof" your friends by making up clever, fake answers to fun trivia such as "_______ is the national bird of Japan." "_______ is illegal to have on your porch in Arizona." Be careful with the correct answers!

A moderator reads a card and everyone gives a word to complete the sentence. For example, “it is against the law in Australia to leave this on your porch.” Everyone has to write down their best guess and turn it in. Then the moderator writes down the answers in the small dry erase board. The moderator also mixes in the correct answer too. Everyone guesses which answer is the truth. Players get points when someone chooses their answer and gets double points if they choose the correct answer.

name: Taskmaster: The Secret Series Game
description:
A brand new Taskmaster game with all-new tasks.

The Secret Series Game invites you and your family and friends to take part in your own series of Taskmaster games at home. Carry the scores from each individual game forward into the next until you complete 10 'episodes' to crown an overall Series Winner!

Who will be the ultimate champion?

—description from the publisher
categories: Movies / TV / Radio theme, Party Game

name: Twin Stars: Moonset â Scenario #2: Protect the Village
description:
A new episodic game that reimplements Twin Stars.

Each episode includes a Scenary postcard and 2 cards.

A few big updates from Twin Stars. A lot mostly in the visual side. It uses cubes, and it uses them on the card instead of using the edges of the card for tracking. Characters have skills, store items and other things on their cards. You can also gain Hide or Hunt. With Hide, you can re-roll an alert die (which is an extra die, not a die on an alert symbol), and Hunt allows you to try for an extra star.


Scenario: Protect the Village

The village of Behyrst is being plagued by Addos the Vampire Princess, who has been using her bloodlust to reduce the already small village down to a small band of survivors. It's currently at a meager six, including you. But you can turn this around with some morale, support and defences. Her bite is fatal, and she's out for blood.

You need to successfully banish the Vampire Princess with three villagers to win before she kills too many more.

Characters:

Machilo
Unora-Vae
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Push Your Luck, Set Collection, Solo / Solitaire Game, Variable Player Powers

name: Snack Happens
description:
Finally, the humans are gone and the animals are free. Time to raid the fridge! One by one the family animals bring delicious snacks like melon, cake, and peppers to their hiding place. Who can fill their stash the fastest?

In Snack Happens, players take on the roles of a cat, mouse, dog, and parrot, whose goal is to fill their secret stash as full as possible with treats. To do this, the active player throws wooden chips as accurately as they can into the bottom box lid, which represents the refrigerator. Afterwards, depending on where the chips landed, the active player may choose to perform a matching action. All the other players in turn may then also choose and perform one of the actions marked by the thrown chips. Each new round, the next player around the table takes a turn tossing the snack chips into the fridge. The special actions Snack Box and Mixer provide additional excitement in this exciting children's game.

—description from the publisher

name: Grail Cup
description:
Grail Cup is made by the renowned Game Designer Bruno Faidutti and illustrated by John Kovalic himself.

In the game, you will try to reach the castle first, trapping your enemies along the way, and even influencing a mighty Dragon so it can keep your opponents away. A clever hidden role selection-drafting system, reminiscing of Citadels' will allow you to bluff your way through Victory. A light and fun race game played in no more than 30mn.

During each turn, you select a role which will define who you are playing and which action you'll take. Turn order is defined by the role you selected, and acting first or last can have tremendous consequences.

-description from publisher

name: Zounds!
description:
A Shakespearean card game for Rhymesters, Rulers and Star-Crossed Language Lovers.

Build the most valuable London theatre season by collecting characters from thirteen of Shakespeare’s best-loved plays. This illustrated card-based party game combines Shakespeare, drama, and money—it’s catnip for theatre buffs, language nerds, and book clubs.
Collect complete plays with all four of their leading characters. The wild cards can increase or decrease your fortune. If you fill in the missing word in the lines of dialog on the bottom of the cards at the end of the game, whether on your own sets of cards or others', you earn extra points for each correct quote. May the biggest Bard lover win!

name: Squillo Time Travels: Megere & Meretrici
description:
Welcome to the dark ages of the Middle Ages: sex, torture and magic in the second chapter of Squillo TIME TRAVELS. In the days of the Inquisition and the Black Death, Hags and Harlots solace the barbaric fiefdom.
Grant the favors of your Harlots to the Emperor and send them to relieve to the Crusaders. Ask your Harlots to invoke the Evil One and cast Bills against other Pimps. In collaboration with *Feudalism and Liberty* who helped best set the cleverly constructed game between *Holy Inquisition* and *Crusades*. Introduces the *Bill* cards.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Benvenuti nell’epoca oscura del Medioevo: sesso, torture e magia nel secondo capitolo di Squillo TIME TRAVELS. Ai tempi dell’Inquisizione e della Peste Nera, Megere e Meretrici sollazzano il feudo in preda alle barbarie.
Concedi i favori delle tue Meretrici allo Imperatore e mandale a dare sollievo
ai Crociati. Chiedi alle tue Megere di invocare il Maligno e lancia Fatture contro gli altri Papponi. In collaborazione con *Feudalesimo e Libertà* che ha contribuito ad ambientare al meglio il gioco costruito con astuzia tra *Santa Inquisizione* e *Crociate*. Introduce le carte *Fattura*.

—description from the publisher
categories: Ancient, Card Game, Humor, Mature / Adult
mechanics: Deck, Bag, and Pool Building, Hand Management

name: Sorry!: Giant Edition
description:
It’s the classic game of Sorry with a GIANT twist! Start by placing your 3 giant pawns on your corner of the big, 64” x 64” vinyl mat gameboard. Spin the spinner to move your pawns out of the starting area, and then the fun begins! Players race to move their pawns around the board, sliding forward on Slider spaces if they’re lucky and getting knocked back to Start if they aren’t. Be the first player to get your 3 pawns around the board and safely to Home, and you win! SORRY! GIANT EDITION’s large vinyl mat is at home on your living room floor, or take it outside to take the competition outdoors! Simple to play but loaded with suspense, strategy, and a little luck, SORRY! GIANT EDITION is big, unforgettable fun for get-togethers with friends and family.

- description from publisher
mechanics: Race, Roll / Spin and Move, Take That

name: Double Thieves
description:
Double Thieves is a roll and write game for two players in which you'll play a pair of thieves racing around the map while stealing items. But though the two thieves may be working together, they're also bitter rivals. You never know if you'll be able to steal the item you're after, since your "partner" is always the one driving the car!

Use your skills and jammers well, and with a bit of luck, you might just be able to outwit your partner in crime! Finish your jobs before your rival does, and you'll have enough cash to leave them high and dry. Just keep an eye out for security—if you get caught, all of your hard work will be for nothing!
mechanics: Grid Movement, Roll / Spin and Move

name: Movie Scene It?
description:
Get ready to put your movie knowledge to the ultimate test with the Movie Scene It? Game! From classic films to the latest blockbusters, use your binge streaming expertise to win the game. Movie Scene It? is more than just movie trivia and is not only for movie buffs! Memory, observation, and puzzle-solving skills are required to win. Put your knowledge and sharpness to the test! Download the Gamestar+ App to stream real movie clips as you play and amplify the fun.

- This all-new version of Movie Scene It? streams movie clips straight to your TV and devices!
- Family board games + streaming content = more fun!
- All you need is an internet connection and at least 2 people.
- Includes over 550 on-screen questions from your favorite movies!
- Plus 450 Movie trivia questions on cards included in the box.
- The Flextime gameboard can be folded for shorter games!

Includes: Flextime gameboard, six-sided dice, eight-sided dice, 4 reference cards, 4 metal game pieces, 30 Buzz cards, 150 trivia cards, 1 Instruction sheet with product license key for Gamestar+
categories: Movies / TV / Radio theme, Party Game, Trivia
mechanics: Roll / Spin and Move, Team-Based Game

name: Escape Experience: Time Rogue
description: Your space ship has been caught in a time loop. Your goal is to save the ship and escape from this time loop. To achieve that, you have to make decisions which cost time points. When the time points are used up, you have to restart the game, but you can keep collected items and information that can be combined to solve the mysteries. You win when you manage to escape the time loop with a perfect game.

name: Scotland Yard: Italia
description:
The version set across the Italian peninsula of the famous Scotland Yard! Mister X has been hiding in Italian cities and has new means of transport and techniques to escape the detectives. An exciting hunt for Mister X throughout Italy, but only the most cunning will win. Will the detectives be distracted by the charm of the Italian landscapes or will Mister X be blocked and captured? The famous strategy game unites the whole family once again!

—description from the publisher (translated)
mechanics: Connections, Cooperative Game, Deduction, Hidden Movement, Point to Point Movement, Roles with Asymmetric Information

name: Heroes of Barcadia: Con Crud Promo Tile
description:
A promo monster tile given out at Gen Con 2023.

This is a level 5 monster that causes 5 HP of damage if not defeated. If anyone leaves the room, this monster flips back over and can be fought again. Don't be the one to bring Con Crud back to the group!
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Humor, Mature / Adult, Party Game

name: Soda
description:
Do you like soda? Drink it in moderation, and don't exceed the maximum intake of 13g of sugar! Bluff your way through to avoid getting caught, as some Soda cards aren't really the drinks they appear to be.

The last player to drink a soda starts the game. On his turn, the first player draws a card and adds it to his hand. He then chooses a Soda card from his hand and places it on the table in front of him, either face-down or face-up, around the Scale:

Face down: bluff. The player does not mention the actual value except to himself.

Face up: power activation. The player announces the actual value of the card and immediately activates the power indicated on it, if it has one.

Before drawing a card, the player whose turn it is can say "Too much sugar!" The previous player then turns over the Soda cards lying around the Scale. If the sum of the cards exceeds 13g, he loses the round. Otherwise, the player who said "Too much sugar!" loses the round. All players except the player who lost the round win the cards placed in front of them.

A new round begins. When the deck is exhausted, players end the game. Each player adds up the actual values of the cards they have won.

—description from the designer

name: EVE: War for New Eden
description:
Galactic Glory Awaits!
Step into the cosmos like never before with EVE: War for New Eden. Based on the iconic massively multiplayer online game, this board game captures the boundless possibilities and immense combat of the EVE Online universe. Use diplomacy, deception, and direct warfare to engage your rivals in a grand game of cosmic chess. Make the first move today!

Faction Development
In EVE Online, the course that you take is always your own. Choose from a broad spectrum of developments to invest your research tokens in. Keep your plans hidden and reveal completed advancement only when it is the right time to catch enemies off guard. Every game is an opportunity to surprise and invent new paths to victory.

Expand Your Empire
Uncharted solar systems are waiting to be explored. Claim them and seize the valuable resources hidden within. You can further improve your territory by deploying distinctive structures in dedicated spots. Use economy on a galactic scale to establish your dominance.

Build Your Economy
Fight over the control of mineral-rich systems. Trade and manufacture to obtain rare components. Finally, spend your resources to build spaceships and improve your board presence.

Epic Spaceships
Every asset you have collected will be strategically utilized to deploy a formidable fleet of spaceships. Stand resilient against incoming assaults or launch calculated offensives. Unleash the full might of your armada in the theater of cosmic warfare.

Spectacular Battles
Among the stars, there can only be one true ruler. The modern and innovative combat system of EVE: War for New Eden gives you full control over your formations. Experience the thrill of quick early-game clashes that escalate to monumental battles as the stakes are getting higher. Chart your course through the stars!

Universe Managed
This game was engineered to enrich your experience. Streamlined setup and practicalities that organize the play area will enable you to enjoy it straight from the box. The standout feature is undoubtedly the modular and interconnected map frame that holds the universe steady and effortlessly controlled. Experience the 4X like never before!

Still Looking for More?
In an endless cosmos, there is always room for more action. EVE: War For New Eden features multiple expansions that will set the stage for new adventures and elevate the stunning visuals of the game. Get ready to explore new frontiers!
categories: Science Fiction, Space Exploration, Video Game Theme

name: Find-a-Saurus
description:
Roll the dice, then be the first to grab the right Dino.

Place the 36 dinosaur cards on the table, then roll the dice to give an accessory, dinosaur, and card colour. The first player to grab the correct card using the grabber wins the round! Be the first player to grab 5 cards to win the game!

Prepare yourself for some prehistoric hilarity!

name: Dutch Resistance: Orange Shall Overcome! â Dice Tower Halt Promo Cards
description: 3 new Halt cards, Shut the Door!, Game Unboxing, and The Game Review
categories: Educational, Expansion for Base-game, World War II

name: Side Quest: Nemesis â 3D Core Puzzle
description:
Try to crack the 3D Core Puzzle to enrich your experience and delve into the Nemesis universe even more! This promo gives you an additional riddle to be solved.

—description from publisher

name: Äesko pro pamÄtnÃ­ky
description: The aim of the game Äesko pro pamÄtníky is to answer the questions correctly and get one "mark" from each circle. Players move around the game board and answer a question from the circle their piece ends up on after a roll of the dice.

name: Kimono
description:
Geisha-themed game for 2-4 players, where you compete to gain the favor of the emperor getting your character more elegant than the others.

It's a set collection game focused on getting more points at the end of the game.

At the start of Kimono you have to choose a maiko to support. You display the Kakemono board and take the six buttons for you chosen character. Depending on the number of players, you use more or less fabric cards and accessories.

Each card has a number and a pair of signs (Animal, vegetal, or three marks of the draper) which will be used to make combinations and scoring points. Cards are displayed at the center of the table, alongside the Kakemono board, in a 4 lines x 4 cards or 5x3 disposition for 2/4 players and 3 players respectively.

The main phase of the game is called the Market phase. All the fabric cards and accessories will be displayed at the centre of the table, but only those matching the selected colours.
In the draw phase, a player must draw one card that is on the extreme right of any line of their choice. Players must draw them in their turns in order to make combinations, which appear on the Kakemono board a the center of the table. That's is the way a player can score points on this game.

For example, in an attempt to make a Katyou Fugetsu kakemono player 1 will need 2, 3, 4, 5 or 6 cards with the Animal mark on them. Player 1 can use 2 cards with the same number (for example 2) with the animal mark on it, and, as marked on the Kakemono board, he will score two points. Player 1 must put the button on the Kakemono board in the matching combination and no other player can make that combination again.

The end of the game arrives when each player has drawn 12 cards. In this phase, players gain points for each combination made, also if they used the 12 cards they drawn there is 2 extra points for those players. Each accessory card is equal to 1 extra point. Finally, players score how many kinds of fabric they used as listed on the kakemono board. The player with the highest score is the winner.
